meanings.definition: A new assessment or evaluation of something.
meanings.sent1: After the reappraisals, the value of the house increased.
meanings.sent2: The company conducted reappraisals of its assets to determine their worth.
meanings.sent3: During the reappraisals, they discovered hidden treasures in the attic.
meanings.sent4: Her reappraisals of the situation shed new light on the matter.
meanings.sent5: The reappraisals brought clarity to the confusion surrounding the issue.

meanings.definition: The act of reevaluating or reconsidering something.
meanings.sent1: The reappraisals of the budget led to cost-saving measures.
meanings.sent2: She requested reappraisals of the evidence to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The reappraisals of his decision made him change his mind.
meanings.sent4: Their reappraisals of the project revealed flaws in the initial plan.
meanings.sent5: Through reappraisals, they found better solutions to the problem.
